StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPointOfContact]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PointOfContactID uniqueiden..er
AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN --ContactName is a generalize name for any person or place SELECT [PointOfContactID], [En.tyTitle], [En.tyTypeID], [POCLastName], [POCLegalMiddleName],[POCFirstName],[Street1], [Street2],[City],[State],[ZipCode], [TelephoneNumber],[CellPhoneNumber], [FaxNumber],[EmailAddress],[ValueToOSS],[Remarks],[CITY_CODE], [COUNTY_CODE], [STATE_CODE] --,[UserLogin],[UpdateDate] FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] poc -- inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].MediaType mt on mt.MediaTypeID = poc.En.tyType
WHERE [PointOfContactID] = @PointOfContactID
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
